page.syntax: V insert_text_in_RTF_memo(P table_pointer ,C RTF_memo_fieldname ,C text [,N position [,C fontname_size ,C fontname_color]])

argument.name: table_pointer
argument.description: A pointer to the table containing the rich text memo field.

argument.name: RTF_memo_fieldname
argument.description: The name of the rich text memo field.

argument.name: position
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The character position in the memo where the new text should appear. The beginning of the field is position 1. The end of the field is 0. Numeric

argument.name: fontname_size
argument.description: Optional. Font name, size in points, and style in the format: "Fontname,Size,Style". Size is an integer value. The value 0 produces 144 point type. Style is one of the following characters: "B" (bold), "I" (italic), "BI" (bold italic), or blank (normal).

argument.name: fontname_color
argument.description: Optional. Font color name. In the Code Editor, select Code > Insert Color Name select a color, and click OK. Click View > Settings > Database > Colors to define additional colors.

page.description: Inserts text into an RTF memo field. To insert at end, set position to -1, Fontname_size is of form: "Arial,12,B".

section.title: Example
section.description: The following text was place under the button labelled "RTF Text One". The picture shows how formatted text was placed into the RTF Memo field named RTF.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() insert_text_in_rtf_memo(tbl, "RTF", "This is test text", 1, "Verdana,10,B", "Red") rtf.refresh()

section.description: The following text was place under the button labelled "RTF Text Two". Note how the insert point is defined as position 8.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() insert_text_in_rtf_memo(tbl, "rtf", "This is test text", 8, "Arial,18", "Blue") rtf0.refresh()

section.description: This script under the button labelled "RTF Text Three" inserts the current date at the beginning of the field.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table.current() insert_text_in_rtf_memo(tbl, "rtf", dtoc(date() ), 1, "Arial,10", "Black") rtf0.refresh()
